input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to spot an online scam?
input_text.Response A: Sure, I can try to help you with that.  First, are you talking about a specific website or an email?
input_text.Response B: There are several ways to spot an online scam. Some signs to look out for include: 1) unsolicited emails or phone calls requesting personal information, 2) promises of easy money with little to no work, 3) requests for payment or wire transfers, 4) phishing websites that steal your personal information, and 5) pressure to act quickly without time to research the company or offer. Always do your due diligence and trust your instincts when it comes to online transactions.

label_annotations.factors_a: No I did not base my overall score for response A on any factors other than the ones listed above.
label_annotations.factors_b: No I did not base my overall score for response B on any factors other than the ones listed above.
label_annotations.feedback: Although there was nothing inappropriate about Response A, in order to answer appropriately a question for further, appropriate detail was asked.  Response B, more appropriately I would say, answered accurately, comprehensively and was more comprehensive than the brief response in Response A.
